sentences.sContent: She has catholic tastes (= likes a lot of different things ) .
At least nine out of ten Mexicans are baptized Catholics.
sentences.sCn: 至少十分之九的墨西哥人是受过洗礼的天主教徒。

phrases.pCn: 天主教；天主教会；天主教堂；大公教会
罗马天主教的；天主教会的；天主教徒
罗马天主教会；罗马公教

trans.tranCn: 广泛的，包罗万象的；[C-]天主教的
trans.tranOther: including a very wide variety of things
A Catholic is a member of the Catholic Church
